title: 1984 Norwegian Second Division
text:
The 1984 <a href="1.%20divisjon">2. divisjon</a> was a Norway's second-tier <a href="association%20football">football</a> league season.
The league was contested by 24 teams, divided into two groups; A and B. The winners of group A and B were promoted to the <a href="1985%201.%20divisjon">1985 1. divisjon</a>. The second placed teams met the 10th position finisher in the <a href="1984%201.%20divisjon">1. divisjon</a> in a qualification round where the winner was promoted to 1. divisjon. The bottom three teams inn both groups were relegated to the <a href="2.%20divisjon">3. divisjon</a>.
